backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and state for files, folders, notes, missions, authorization, and health/diagnostic queries with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping mission-related UI features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation of a draft baseline synced exactly to Live version 114 and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app root.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change-freeze notice prohibiting code changes after restoring Live v114 until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, icons, display behavior, and related settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a lightweight service worker with minimal precaching, network-first fetch logic, and cache cleanup.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the restored frontend matches Live v114 across authentication, UI, components, and behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application wiring theme providers and contexts, showing HomePage and optional intro overlay based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying detailed actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical info.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG gallery icon with hover effects and pulse animation.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty file placeholder for a future connectivity indicator component.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Adds a fixed subtle bottom line element for UI decoration.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening a blocked file or download it instead.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog showing previews for various file types with actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Component handling file uploads, link creation, and note creation with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders interface, with optional disabled and overlay states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog allowing creation, renaming, deleting, and selecting folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folder manager supporting creation, editing, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen file viewer with navigation, swipe support, external open, sharing, moving, and deletion features.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, long‑press actions, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top app header with theme toggle, authentication menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a brief animated splash screen and fades out before signaling completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy‑to‑clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission view with tasks, autosave, attached files/notes, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions section.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen mission list UI handling mission creation, editing, deletion, swipe actions, and switching between incomplete and completed missions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Layout wrapper that restricts content to a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a mission, listing missions and executing move mutations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog for viewing a note with actions for sending, downloading, sharing, or deleting the note.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or removing files and notes to or from folders, with performance diagnostics.
Swipeable row component exposing edit and delete actions with drag handling and animations.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing aggregate upload progress and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Renders a full‑screen welcome intro with animated text, a target‑style SVG icon, and a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Provides a context managing backend actor initialization, retries, errors, and sign‑out logic with exponential backoff.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Manages upload batches, progress updates, and completion tracking with aggregated animation‑frame progress flushing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor via React Query, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the actor becomes ready to speed up home screen loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, persistence, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer via a media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Provides debounced mission autosave logic with change detection, pending save queuing, and mission-switch resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with backend actor integration and cache management.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for creating, retrieving, deleting, and moving notes, with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for managing files and folders, including listing, mission-specific queries, and folder creation with concurrency-limited uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light/dark theme variables and shared UI styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, global styles, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home screen component managing auth state, data prefetching, and lazy-loaded folder/mission views with optional dev smoke testing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines error messages and helpers for classifying actor initialization, token, and canister-state errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing files via Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer vs download vs office preview logic.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and provides previewability and human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, checks completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares task arrays safely with BigInt-aware equality checks.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements an opt-in performance timing utility with start/end measurements and async operation timing helpers.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Provides diagnostics for React Query mission caches and logs delete mutation lifecycle details.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Implements a multi‑step smoke test that creates folders, missions, uploads a file, creates a link, and verifies each via list APIs.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides a simple promise‑based concurrency limiter to control the number of parallel async operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and registering plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the canonical v114 baseline for validation and drift detection.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for mission archiving, swipe navigation, deletion, and reclassification behaviors.
